title: Raise taxes by more to offset change in spending

content.question: If, at full employment, the government wants to increase its spending by $100 billion without increasing inflation in the short run, it must do which of the following?

choices.label: Raise taxes by more than $100 billion.
Raise taxes by less than $100 billion.
Lower taxes by less than $100 billion.

content.answer: Raise taxes by more than $100 billion.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
